jobDescription: Tracking Code  6272-651  Job DescriptionPFS Company Statement:  PFS is a global commerce services company. We help leading brands deliver exceptional commerce experiences worldwide. We are a diverse team with distinct interests, skills, and backgrounds collaborating across all facets of commerce—from business consulting and design to technology and operations. Together, we take pride in performing at our best to produce the best possible results for our client and their clients.  Company Vision: We will provide a Full Commerce SolutionWe will be World-Class at Every Service we offerWe will engage with our clients as a Strategic PartnerBrand Service Representative (BSR) Analytics Manager
